data.title: Gamestop shares jump as much as 18% in premarket trading with Reddit-fueled volatility continuing
data.description: Small-time investors have driven a 1,600% rally in the game retailer's shares. By Monday a volatile pre market saw Gamestop's shares rise by as much as 18%; they were last down about 1.4%

data.author: Bradley Keoun
data.title: First Mover: Silver Is the New GameStop as Musk’s #Bitcoin Stalls
data.description: As bitcoin trades in a range, traders are studying the "Grayscale premium" and watching traditional markets for clues to the next market move.

data.author: RTÉ News
data.title: Timeline - Silver surges as GameStop mania spills over
data.description: Silver prices surged to a five-month high today, silver-mining stocks leapt and coin-selling websites were swamped as small-time investors scooped up the metal, the latest target of a retail-trading frenzy that has unnerved financial markets.

data.author: Utkarsh Deep
data.title: Heavy rains likely in Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Lakshadweep over next 3 days
data.description: Parts of South India — particularly Tamil Nadu, Kerala, and Lakshadweep — are likely to receive widespread rainfall over the next three days, according to the Indian Meteorological Department (IMD). However, the rainfall activity is predicted to decrease considerably from January 13th, the weather department added.
